!Darin: What's more dangerous than a Knight's sword or a Wizard's staff? That thing we call love. More silently than a thief, swifter than a sunset it comes upon you and captures your soul. The minstrels were right; it's sweet and bitter all at once! I cannot concentrate, I cannot sleep, I cannot eat! [Quest _001_LettersOfLove daring_q0001_03.htm|Ask whom he loves.]
